context_bundle.summary: Behavioral rules for AI agents. Clarify before coding, don't re-propose rejected solutions, ask when stuck, recognize context pollution.

onboarding.quick_start: Before coding: CLARIFY requirements. After rejection: DON'T re-propose. When stuck: ASK don't guess. Fresh boot = good decisions. 30+ min = restart consideration.
common_patterns: CLARIFY BEFORE CODING - ask push vs poll, file vs memory
WHEN STUCK ASK - don't guess and waste time
known_errors: Re-proposing rejected approaches with slight variations
Building wrong thing because didn't ask
Going in circles on wrong approach
